info.title: Supaglue API
info.description:
# Introduction

Welcome to the Supaglue unified CRM API documentation. You can use this API to read data that has been synced into Supaglue from third-party providers.

### Base API URL

```
http://localhost:8080/api/crm/v1
```

externalDocs.description: Try out our API in Postman!

created_after.description: If provided, will only return objects created after this datetime
